attributes.action: encourage holiday companies to even out the holiday prices during school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the price of holidays to be regulated so that during school holidays the price remains the same throughout the year. This would in one stroke stop pupils being taken out of school for a cheaper holiday. ie A two week holiday to Spain in early June for a family of 4 is around £1000 but in August it goes up 2.5 times to £2500.

Most low paid workers can not afford this high price. 
To compensate for the increase the prices could be increased across the board to cover the reduction.
Thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
